Monster.Name: Giant Vulture
Monster.Description: A giant vulture has advanced intelligence and a malevolent bent. Unlike its smaller kin, it will attack a wounded creature to hasten its end. Giant vultures have been known to haunt a thirsty, starving creature for days to enjoy its suffering.

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Sight and Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The vulture has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

MonsterTrait.Name: Pack Tactics
MonsterTrait.Text: The vulture has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The vulture makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

MonsterAction.Name: Beak
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Talons
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.
